column4: I have a problem with Gnome - it tries to be smarter than me and refuses me to open files if it thinks it's another type than named. How do I disable that? It's a .asx file. How do I disable that feature?
I've googled with no luck - prob. because I don't know what to google for :-)
does the icon change when you click it?
sometimes yes.. from one to another and then back like the wind changes
